derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from Latin tingere 'to dip or colour'. The noun dates from the mid 18th cent

entry.tran: 微量，少许，一丝，几分(颜色、感情或性质)
entry.def: A tinge of a colour, feeling, or quality is a small amount of it.
